main event: Observer reported viewing a cigar-shaped object with three diamond-shaped windows over Greenlawn, Long Island, New York on October 21, 1956.
interesting points: The object was observed for 2 minutes before it shot away at a fantastic speed., The object emitted a whistling noise and had alternating white, red, blue, and green colors., The observer claimed to have seen several UFOs in the past., There was mention of jets being scrambled in response to UFOs the same day., The witness expressed a desire for media attention regarding his sighting.
sighted object: cigar-shaped object with three diamond-shaped windows
witness description: Male, 16 years old, had a previous interest and experience in observing UFOs.
